body_html:
I found the Variable.value() method that seems like a nicer workaround than the assign (no-)op.
From reading the docs, it seems like like a good fix would be for apply_gradients to call convert_to_tensor.
body_text:
I found the Variable.value() method that seems like a nicer workaround than the assign (no-)op.
From reading the docs, it seems like like a good fix would be for apply_gradients to call convert_to_tensor.
body:
I found the `Variable.value()` method that seems like a nicer workaround than the `assign` (no-)op.
From reading the docs, it seems like like a good fix would be for `apply_gradients` to call `convert_to_tensor`.
